1.0.name: wordpress/one-post-widget
1.0.description: With this plugin you can show last post in widget area so the widget title/content itself is given post title and contents. No listings- only selected post itself. You can choose queue which one to show. Currently it supports showing content from given by post/page ID or just from recent posts. Please see screenshots- they should be self explenatory. Read more @ http://eagerfish.eu/wordpress-plugin-one-post-widget
